A guardian's drink, linking your spirit to the grave for protection.
Makes death safer by depositing your items and experience in a gravestone once dead, this effect lasting %s.
item.skullsandspirits.bloodwine.lore: Dark, fresh and potent, this wine feeds those who consume it the thirst for life.
item.skullsandspirits.rotten_rum.lore: A hearty rum brewed from undeath itself. Fortifies the body with a twisted strength.
item.skullsandspirits.rotten_rum.info: Increases max health, grants health regeneration, boosts damage, and slightly increases size for %s.
item.skullsandspirits.infernal_mule.lore: A sweet, blazing blend crafted for the daring, imbuing the drinker with fiery speed and agility.
item.skullsandspirits.infernal_mule.info: Provides a speed boost and grants a double-jump that clears up to 3 blocks high, both lasting %s.
message.skullsandspirits.graveFailedPlac: Could not place gravestone. Your items have been made invulnerable and been given an infinite lifetime to compensate. If all else fails, use the '/sas recover' command.
message.skullsandspirits.graveFailedBloc: Gravestone block entity failed to initialize. Your items have been made invulnerable and been given an infinite lifetime to compensate. If all else fails, use the '/sas recover' command.
